useCase.name: User completes the work process
useCase.description: User initiates and successfully completes a work process

mainSequence.step: User initiates the work process by performing the action 'DoWork'
First Class creates a request by executing 'Create Request'
Second Class performs the work specified in the request
Second Class notifies First Class that the work is done
First Class acknowledges the completion and notifies the User that the process is done
